document.discussion_title: United States Football Apparel Industry: Production Market Share Analysis 2016
document.topic_text: United States Football Apparel Industry: Production Market Share Analysis 2016 WiseGuyReports - Friday, August 12, 2016. This report studies sales (consumption) of Football Apparel in USA market, focuses on the top players, with sales, price, revenue and market share for each player, covering Adidas Select Sports Slazenger Split by product types, with sales, revenue, price, market share and growth rate of each type, can be divided into Football Shirts Football Shorts and Pants Other Football Apparel Split by applications, this report focuses on sales, market share and growth rate of Football Apparel in each application, can be divided into Application 1 United States Football Apparel Sales Market Report 2021 1 Football Apparel Overview 1.1 Product Overview and Scope of Football Apparel 1.2 Classification of Football Apparel 1.2.1 Football Shirts 1.2.2 Football Shorts and Pants 1.2.3 Other Football Apparel 1.3 Applications of Football Apparel 1.3.1 Application 1 1.4 USA Market Size (Value and Volume) of Football Apparel (2011-2021) 1.4.1 USA Football Apparel Sales, Revenue and Price (2011-2021) 1.4.2 USA Football Apparel Sales and Growth Rate (2011-2021) 1.4.3 USA Football Apparel Revenue and Growth Rate (2011-2021) 2 USA Football Apparel Competition by Manufacturers 2.1 USA Football Apparel Sales and Market Share of Key Manufacturers (2015 and 2016) 2.2 USA Football Apparel Revenue and Share by Manufactures (2015 and 2016) 3 USA Football Apparel (Volume and Value) by Type 3.1 USA Football Apparel Sales and Market Share by Type (2011-2021) 3.2 USA Football Apparel Revenue and Market Share by Type (2011-2021) 4 USA Football Apparel (Volume) by Application 5 USA Football Apparel Manufacturers Analysis 5.1 Adidas 5.1.1 Company Basic Information, Manufacturing Base and Competitors 5.1.2 Football Apparel Product Type and Technology 5.1.2.1 Football Shirts 5.1.2.2 Football Shorts and Pants 5.1.3 Football Apparel Sales, Revenue, Price of Adidas (2015 and 2016) 5.2 Nike 5.2.1 Company Basic Information,Manufacturing Base and Competitors 5.2.2 Consumer Goods Product Type and Technology 5.2.2.1 Football Shirts 5.2.2.2 Football Shorts and Pants 5.2.3 Consumer Goods Sales, Revenue, Price of Nike (2015 and 2016) 5.3 Puma 5.3.1 Company Basic Information,Manufacturing Base and Competitors 5.3.2 Puma Product Type and Technology 5.3.2.1 Football Shirts 5.3.2.2 Football Shorts and Pants 5.3.3 Puma Sales, Revenue, Price of Puma (2015 and 2016) 5.4 Under Armour 5.4.1 Company Basic Information,Manufacturing Base and Competitors 5.4.2 Joma Product Type and Technology 5.4.2.1 Football Shirts 5.4.2.2 Football Shorts and Pants 5.4.3 Under Armour Sales, Revenue, Price of Under Armour (2015 and 2016) 5.5 Umbro 5.5.1 Company Basic Information,Manufacturing Base and Competitors 5.5.2 Umbro Product Type and Technology 5.5.2.1 Football Shirts 5.5.2.2 Football Shorts and Pants 5.5.3 Umbro Sales, Revenue, Price of Umbro (2015 and 2016) 5.6 Amer Sports 5.6.1 Company Basic Information,Manufacturing Base and Competitors 5.6.2 Amer Sports Product Type and Technology 5.6.2.1 Football Shirts 5.6.2.2 Football Shorts and Pants 5.6.3 Amer Sports Sales, Revenue, Price of Amer Sports (2015 and 2016) 5.7 ASICS 5.7.1 Company Basic Information,Manufacturing Base and Competitors 5.7.2 ASICS Product Type and Technology 5.7.2.1 Football Shirts 5.7.2.2 Football Shorts and Pants 5.7.3 ASICS Sales, Revenue, Price of ASICS (2015 and 2016) 5.8 Diadora 5.8.1 Company Basic Information,Manufacturing Base and Competitors 5.8.2 Diadora Product Type and Technology 5.8.2.1 Football Shirts 5.8.2.2 Football Shorts and Pants 5.8.3 Diadora Sales, Revenue, Price of Diadora (2015 and 2016) 5.9 Joma 5.9.1 Company Basic Information,Manufacturing Base and Competitors 5.9.2 Joma Product Type and Technology 5.9.2.1 Football Shirts 5.9.2.2 Football Shorts and Pants 5.9.3 Joma Sales, Revenue, Price of Joma (2015 and 2016) 5.10 Lotto 5.10.1 Company Basic Information,Manufacturing Base and Competitors 5.10.2 Lotto Product Type and Technology 5.10.2.1 Football Shirts 5.10.2.2 Football Shorts and Pants 5.10.3 Lotto Sales, Revenue, Price of Lotto (2015 and 2016) 5.11 Mizuno 5.12 New Balance Athletic Shoe 5.13 Select Sports 6 Football Apparel Technology and Development Trend
